name: Cyborgs
description:
Cyborgs uprising.
Burn everything with lasers, and destroy cities in our cool tactical game!
Nearest future. War is coming!
Strong AI became aware of itself and started uprising against the human race!
Giant robots are walking the streets, burning everything with their deadly lasers.

You're playing for the AI!
- Find yourself in charge of the Cyborgs Apocalypse!
- Enjoy controlling your robotic squad, burning humans, and upgrading the robots!

In our cool tactical game you'll be able to:
- BURN humans with POWERFUL lasers!
- DESTROY cities and CRASH buildings
- Convert enemy units to energy and buy more upgrades
- Defeat Helicopters, Tanks and Rocket Launchers
and upgrade your Cyborgs to make the squad unstoppable!

You'll encounter endless waves of human resistance units,
from simple to hi-tech advanced generations

We have 4 unique classes, and sophisticated yet easy and intuitive upgrade system
Use your skills to last as much as you can
